title: Implement user profile and API key management

requirements: Create user profile page with editable user information
Implement API key management interface with GET /api/user/api-keys, POST /api/user/api-keys, PUT /api/user/api-keys/status
Add daily check-in functionality with POST /api/user/checkin
Create usage statistics display with charts/graphs
Create settings page for user preferences
Display user points/credits balance and transaction history
acceptance: Profile page created: verify by test -f frontend/app/profile/page.tsx
API keys page created: verify by test -f frontend/app/api-keys/page.tsx
User info API integration: verify by grep -r 'GET /api/user/info' frontend/lib/ | wc -l >= 1
API key management: verify by grep -r '/api/user/api-keys' frontend/lib/ | wc -l >= 3
Check-in functionality: verify by grep -r 'POST /api/user/checkin' frontend/lib/ | wc -l >= 1
